## Is this a new skill or an improvement to an existing one?

- [ ] New skill idea
- [ ] Improvement to an existing skill (which one?)

## Describe the use case

What founder problem does this solve? Who would use it and when?

## Proposed approach

If you have ideas on how this could work — workflow, scripts, data sources — describe them here.

## Willing to contribute?

- [ ] Yes, I'd like to implement this
- [ ] I could contribute with some guidance
- [ ] No, just suggesting
